text:
e="preserve">Linda Manz (August 20, 1961 – August 14, 2020) was an American actress. She was active from 1978 to 1997. She was best known for her roles in "Days of Heaven" (1978), "Out of the Blue" (1980), and "Gummo" (1997). Manz was born in New York City.
Manz died on August 14, 2020 from pneumonia caused by lung cancer in New York City at the age of 58.
